REST /helper¶

See Helpers for details.

/helper/help¶

List all existing plugins which have a helper.

/helper/<plugin name>/help¶

List all helpers commands for a plugin.

/helper/<plugin name/<command>/<param 1>/...¶

Use a plugin’s helper.
